title: Endless Space + Disharmony v.1.1.17 (August 2013) repack by RaSl
description:
Hello,

Found this repack on a russian website, its the latest version today (1.1.17 / august 2013) and was not present here, so here it is

I removed the virus wich was present in the repack

cracks seems to be from Skidrow and seems to be working but i didn't indepth tested it yet.

please seed !

notes from original release :

Install and run :

run ESLauncher.exe - in which you select a language game and the player's name.

 
Those who have problems STARTING C
CHECK THE LOG-GAME : 
"Endless Space  EndlessSpace_Data  output_log.txt" 
The truth is out there ... In the last line Judging by the dialed statistics - two of the most probable solutions: - Install the VC + + RTE (available in the Components folder); - Installation DotNetFX 3.5 (mainly for the people "Windows XP")
